name: SNATCHED! (omoide)
description:
Originally made for MiniJam99 with the theme of "Birds", developed further with additional stages and wigs.

Controls:
Move right: →/D, 
Move left: ←/A
Duck: Left Click or ↓/S
When the birds snatches your wig, Left Click on the bird to retrieve your wig!

Made with Unity and Playmaker
Music made with BeepBox
Art made in PixAki and Aseprite
UI made with UI Builder from Unity Asset Store
Particle Effect from Cartoon FX from Unity Asset Store
Sound Effects from Ultimate SFX Bundle from Unity Asset Store
Bird sound from Freesound.org

Made by Omoide Arcade which includes:
Omi(He/Him)
Cheyne (He/Him)
